titleStmt.title: A new discourse of trade wherein is recommended several weighty points relating to companies of merchants : the act of navigation, naturalization of strangers, and our woollen manufactures, the balance of trade, and the nature of plantations, and their consequences in relation to the kingdom, are seriously discussed and some proposals for erecting a court of merchants for determining controversies, relating to maritime affairs, and for a law for transferrance of bills of depts, are humbly offered / by Josiah Child.
titleStmt.author: Child, Josiah, Sir, 1630-1699.

titleStmt.title: A new discourse of trade wherein is recommended several weighty points relating to companies of merchants : the act of navigation, naturalization of strangers, and our woollen manufactures, the balance of trade, and the nature of plantations, and their consequences in relation to the kingdom, are seriously discussed and some proposals for erecting a court of merchants for determining controversies, relating to maritime affairs, and for a law for transferrance of bills of depts, are humbly offered / by Josiah Child.
titleStmt.author: Child, Josiah, Sir, 1630-1699.
Culpeper, Thomas, Sir, 1578-1662. Small treatise against usury.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by John Everingham ...,
